entries.title: Fighter jets scrambled to Trump's New Jersey golf course as president's trip interrupted by SEVEN rogue aircraft
entries.content: Fighter jets were scrambled to President Donald Trump 's New Jersey golf course on Sunday when a rogue aircraft breached the temporary flight restriction zone.

entries.title: Christina Haack and Lookalike Daughter Taylor, 14, Pose Together in Paris
entries.content: Christina Haack and her teenage daughter soaked up the City of Love together. Haack, 42, took to her Instagram Stories on Friday, August 1, to share a photo of herself with daughter Taylor, 14, as the pair enjoyed dining in a Parisian restaurant. entries.title: Burt Reynolds' Ex Wife Loni Anderson Dead Days Before 80th Birthday
entries.content: Burt Reynolds’ ex wife and former WKRP in Cincinnati star Loni Anderson has died. She was 79. “We are heartbroken to announce the passing of our dear wife, mother and grandmother,” Anderson’s family said in a statement to the Associated Press on Sunday, August 3, announcing her death. entries.title: Cambodian Auteur Rithy Panh Chats About His Super 8 Plans and Whether Cinema Can Save Us
entries.content: The Locarno Film Festival jury president also discusses AI and social media, being "a little bit afraid" of judging movies, and talking to the late Chris Marker "like a saint of cinema" when facing work difficulties.
